game.name: orrb
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: orrb is a path building puzzle game where you explore & experiment by placing tiles. Discover different tiles, how they behave, and how you can use them to send the Orrb on its way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: orrb is a path building puzzle game where you explore & experiment by placing tiles. Discover different tiles, how they behave, and how you can use them to send the Orrb on its way.
